mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "order", c.order_No AS "order.order_No", a.receivable_money AS "receivableMoney", a.revenue_money AS "revenueMoney", a.receipt_date AS "receiptDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN s_order c ON a.order_id=c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_receipt( id, order_id, receivable_money, revenue_money, receipt_date, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{order.id}, #{receivableMoney}, #{revenueMoney}, #{receiptDate}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_receipt SET order_id = #{order.id}, receivable_money = #{receivableMoney}, revenue_money = #{revenueMoney}, receipt_date = #{receiptDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
